markup_reference.title: Calculate the total size of all stories

note.item: Macro markup is space sensitive and we advise you to stick to the indentation scheme specified in the example. If you add project as a parameter this needs to be added to a new line as shown in the markup below.
Starting from 13.2.2, the value query macro is not supported as part of URL. See related Knowledge Base article.

p.markup: value query: SELECT SUM('size') WHERE Type = Story project: project_one

row.label: query
row.col: A custom MQL query, the results of executing this query will be shown as an value.
